snippet: President Obama is on a three-day trip in the state that birthed his bid for the White House, this time using the broad reach of his office.
abstract: Pres Obama is on a three-day bus tour of Iowa, state that launched his bid for the presidency in 2008; he is using the executive reach of the presidency to reignite the fervor, announcing $170 million for aid to farmers and ranchers affected by the drought.
lead_paragraph: President Obama is on a three-day trip in the state that birthed his bid for the White House, this time using the broad reach of his office.

headline.seo: On Bus Tour, Obama Returns to Swing State of Iowa
headline.main: Obama Returns to Iowa in Bid to Reignite the Fervor
headline.print_headline: Obama Returns to Iowa in Bid to Reignite the Fervor
